name: Soreike X Kokoroji
overview: Soreike X Kokoroji (rereleased as Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol.13 - Shinri Game - Soreike X Kokoroji, the 13th game in the practical 1500 series released for the Playstation One console by D3 Publisher) let the user to know the compatibiliy (good or bad) that he got with a friend, job mates, family members by answering different questions that the game will ask him about. The game is playable in a one player mode in which the game will ask the player different questions, or in a 2 player mode in which each human player will answer the questions and the game will provide at the end the compatibility results.
